author: jochembrouwer
content: Does some client have EIP 5450 reference tests?

author: _shemnon
content: They haven't been cross-validated, so treat each failure with suspicion that the test may also be wrong.

author: jochembrouwer
content: Yes, but I think this is  a general problem since we do not have general consensus tests ðŸ™‚

author: jochembrouwer
content: What would be great if that we have X inputs which generates Y outputs -> the outputs (Y) itself might be wrong, but if X has full coverage this would be extremely helpful ðŸ™‚

author: jochembrouwer
content: I.e. ensure that with X inputs we have full coverage and we fill the Y outputs 'later' ðŸ™‚
